item.title: The Little Round Pill That’s Winning Awards Season
item.description: Plus, how Emily Bronte got her bra-like font and the man who really launched Armani in Hollywood (hint: it wasn’t Richard Gere).

item.title: Margot Robbie, Jacob Elordi Get Close and Personal in Emerald Fennell’s ‘Wuthering Heights’ Trailer
item.description: The feature adaptation of Emily Brontë’s classic work hits theaters next year from Warner Bros.
